Classes in org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.reasoner used by org.semanticweb.kaon2.api

Classes in org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.reasoner used by org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.reasoner
Query
          Represents a conjunctive DL-safe query over an ontology.
Reasoner
          Provides methods to answer questions over an ontology.
Reasoner.AxiomProcessingStage
          An enumeration of different stages in axiom processing.
Reasoner.RuleProcessingStage
          An enumeration of different stages in rule processing.
SubsumptionHierarchy
          Represents a subsumption hierarcy for atomc classes in an ontology.
SubsumptionHierarchy.Node
          Represents a node in the subsumption hiearchy.
